* Represents a command used by Jobe to execute user's commands.

* @param storage Storage object to save tasks to user's local file.
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasklist, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws JobeException;

* Represents a command to instruct Jobe to exit when user inputs "deadline".
* Creates new deadline task, adds this created task to user's task list,
* saves tasks to user's local file and prints confirmation messages to the user.
* @param taskList Current user's task list for new tasks to be added.
* @param ui Ui object used to display messages to the user.
* @param storage Storage object to save tasks to user's local file.
* @throws JobeException If DeadlineTask class throws an exception when new task is created.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws JobeException {
System.out.println("Got it. I've added this task:");
System.out.println("Now you have " + taskList.size() + " tasks in the list");
* Represents a command to instruct Jobe to exit when user inputs "delete".
* Searches for tasks corresponding to the user's input index, and removes it from task list.
* Saves tasks to user's local file and prints confirmation messages to the user.
* @param taskList Current user's task list for new tasks to be added.
* @param ui Ui object used to display messages to the user.
* @param storage Storage object to save tasks to user's local file.
* @throws JobeException If user is trying to delete a task which does not exist.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws JobeException {
throw new JobeException("OOPS!!!! You are trying to delete a task which does not exist!");
System.out.println("Now you have " + taskList.size() + " tasks in the list");

* Represents a command to instruct Jobe to exit when user inputs "find".

* @param ui Ui object used to display messages to the user.

* @throws JobeException If user has no tasks in the task list.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws JobeException {
throw new JobeException("OOPS!!!! There are no matching tasks in your list!");

* Represents a command to instruct Jobe to exit when user inputs "mark".
